SEARCH
Module PSP24
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameControllerInterface, Serializable, Runnable, Remote
public class GameController extends Object implements GameControllerInterface, Serializable, Runnable
GameController Class Controls a specific Game Game by allowing a player to perform all actions that can be executed in a game The class can add, remove, reconnect and disconnects players to the game and let players pick and place cards from the Board to them Book.

It manages all the game from the beginning (GameStatus.WAIT to the ending {GameStatus.Ended}
See Also:

    • ping

      public void ping(String nickname, GameListenerInterface me) throws RemoteException
      Adds a Ping to the receivedPing map when a ClientMsgPing is sent and calls the method.
      Specified by:
      ping in interface GameControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player who sent the ping message
      me - the client who sends ping messages
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication-related issue during the remote method invocation.

    • run

      public void run()
      Monitors the ping messages to detect player disconnections. This method runs in a separate thread and continuously checks the status of the game and the received ping messages. If a player is detected as disconnected based on the ping timeout, the player is disconnected and removed from the ping map.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
